name: Change Management Controls
description: The entity implements change management controls to ensure that system changes, including infrastructure, applications, and configurations, are authorized, tested, approved, and properly implemented while minimizing disruption to operations and security posture.
objective: Ensure that changes to the system are properly identified, documented, tested, approved, and implemented in a controlled manner that maintains system integrity, security, and availability.
control_activities: All code changes go through pull request review process
Required approvals from designated reviewers before merge
Automated testing runs on all pull requests (CI/CD pipeline)
Protected branches prevent direct commits to production code
Deployment approvals required for production releases
Change documentation includes description, testing, and rollback plan
key_attributes: Mandatory peer review of all code changes
Multi-level approval workflow for critical changes
testing_procedures: Review sample of pull requests for proper approvals
Verify branch protection rules are configured
Examine CI/CD pipeline for required quality gates
Verify segregation of duties in change approval
